author: Laura Fitzpatrick
text:
Do you know of any municipalities that publish online the names of
people making public information requests  (requestor info: name, date &
nature of request)?
Background:
We are pondering publishing each request online.  In my preliminary research, I have found two municipalities that does publish this information online  (links w/more info below).  I seek more examples.
Thank you,
Laura Fitzpatrick
Assistant City Manager
Rio Rancho, NM
Links:
Village of Tinley Park, IL
http://www.tinleypark.org/votp.asp?ctp=FOIA.htm
City of Chicago, IL
http://www.cityofchicago.org/city/en/depts/obm/supp_info/obm_foia.html
Tinley Park Article:
ARTICLE: http://triblocal.com/tinley-park/2011/03/09/tinley-park-to-begin-posting-public-records-requests-names-online/
title: publish public info requests details online
